basics.label: Support Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Successful and motivated IT Escalation Manager possessing extensive knowledge of leading a team of high performance Tier 3 engineers solving complex IT issues and providing excellent service for Fortune 1000 customers.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed a number of teams with team size of up to 26 engineers at a time in Windows Platforms and System Center, including Setup, Cluster, Performance, SCOM, and Virtualization.
highlights: Led weekly meetings with other Core managers to reach target metrics.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supported a number of products including Outlook, Exchange Server, Microsoft Operations Manager, and Systems Management Server.
highlights: Wrote training for Exchange 2000 server while in readiness role for Beta.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Head of county school network, responsible for Novell servers in 22 schools across county.
highlights: Led community-wide effort during which about 50 people built approximately 75 computers in a day to donate to the school system.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for training faculty regarding using the Internet, developed a series of 4 classes on Internet usage and trained CPCC faculty over 6 month period.
highlights: Responsible for networking and Internet in campus Library.

awards.title: Distinguished Toastmaster award
awards.summary: Highest award possible for Toastmasters international.

awards.title: Gold Star award
awards.summary: Awarded for work as hiring manager - strong diversity hiring and identifying top talent resulting in over 70 new hires.

awards.title: GPGP
awards.summary: Awarded for collaboration with high profile customer technical issue.
